channel.title: Spirit help please
channel.description: I just added some updated magic icons in my cache, yet I got this error when my client was loading [code]Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub1_Sub1. <init><Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:110> at client.method6<client.java:7115> at Applet_Sub1.run<Applet_Sub1.java:48> at client.run<client.java:4578> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown Source>[/code] I saved it in the Tom cache editor and I compiled my client How do I fix this/what do I do next? Thanks

item.title: Spirit help please
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

I just added some updated magic icons in my cache, yet I got this error when my client was loading

Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub1_Sub1. <init><Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:110> at client.method6<client.java:7115> at Applet_Sub1.run<Applet_Sub1.java:48> at client.run<client.java:4578> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown Source>
I saved it in the Tom cache editor and I compiled my client
How do I fix this/what do I do next?
Thanks

Read full topic
